text: Bazobagirira inzigo mugabo haje icobatera c’ubwoba uzoca ubabona bakwitegereza amaso yabo nayo ahindagurika hirya no hino nkuwaguye igihumure c’urupfu, mugabo ubwoba bubavuyemwo baca basubira kubashavuza kundimi zabo zikaze cane, bagaca bagira inzigo kumigisha y’Imana, abo rero ntibemeye kuri ivyo, Imana yaciye ibakurako imigisha y’ibikorwa vyabo, n’ivyo biroroshe cane ku Mana
